column4: E: cupsys: subprocess post-installation script returned error exit status 1
I try and install anything from synaptic I get this message  E: cupsys: subprocess post-installation script returned error exit status 1
do this start a termainl then in there type:          sudo apt-get update then try to install anything when it gives an error do this put "sudo" in front of the suggested command and let it work away
